Name: The Matinee
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of kaffir lime leaf.
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
Review: Created in 2010 by Metinee Kongsrivilai at The Bon Vivant in Edinburgh, Scotland.
History: Kaffir lime leaves add zest to this vanilla-infused Rum Sour with added vermouth complexity.
